p: The aqueous extracts of Adiantum caudatum leaves, obtained by Soxhlet extraction, resulted as more powerful than the hexanoic one against Pseudomonas aeruginosa [ 50]. The methanol extracts from the flowers of Agastache rugosa (Korean mint) showed high antibacterial activities [ 51]. Finally, the carotenoid fucoxanthin was observed to have a significantly stronger impact on Gram-positive than Gram-negative bacteria [ 52, 53].
